SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
!----------------------------------------------- Parameter validation --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Puppet Path" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ Buidling Puppet run command -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_OPTIONS# = "--onetime --no-daemonize --debug --detailed-exitcodes --color=false"
: IF &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_PATH#" agent &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_OPTIONS#') : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, 'puppet agent &UC4RB_PUP_PUPPET_OPTIONS#') : ENDIF
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# ! Invoking command &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** RUN AGENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** RUN AGENT ACTION FAILED ********"
execcode=$? if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else case $execcode in 2) echo "INFO: The puppet run succeeded, and some resources were changed.";; 4) echo "INFO: The run succeeded, and some resources failed.";; 6) echo "INFO: The run succeeded, and included both changes and failures.";; *) echo "ERROR: Fail to run agent.";; esac : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi
if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER
